summary: This is a cozy house for the dragonborn to relax in. it has a lot of named storage, a display room with 3 large display cases, 6 weapon plaques, 5 weapon racks, 5 mannequins and some animal heads. it has many places to sit and has alchemy and enchanting tables, and a smithing area in the basement
descriptionHtml:
[size=6] [font=Comic Sans MS] [color=#ff0000]Dovahkiin's Lodge
[/color][/font][/size]
This is a house located somewhere in between riverwood and whiterun, in a forrest area. it has a lot of named storage (heavy armour, light armour, soul gems, food, ingots, etc), a bedroom with a double bed, a large fire in the center with may benches around it, tables with food and drink, an alchemy bench, an arcane enchanter, a display room with 3 large display cases, 6 weapon plaques, 5 weapon racks, 5 mannequins and some animal heads and a basement that has all the smithing equipment.

[size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000]future plans
[/color][/font][/size] 
[list][*]companion beds for use with mods like your home is my home[/*]
[*]more things to display things on[/*]
[*]a bard[/*]
[/list]

[size=4]NOTE: [/size][size=3]the mannequins may not be in there right place the start, but when you put things on them they will god back to their spots so don't worry. [/size]
author: fartykis
